hero.title: Building Dreams, Creating Homes
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for construction services and real estate solutions. Quality craftsmanship and exceptional properties.

construction.title: Construction Services
construction.subtitle: Expert Construction Solutions
construction.description: From residential to commercial projects, we deliver quality construction with attention to detail and commitment to excellence.

residential.title: Residential Construction
residential.description: Custom homes, renovations, and additions tailored to your vision and lifestyle.

commercial.title: Commercial Construction
commercial.description: Office buildings, retail spaces, and industrial facilities built to the highest standards.

renovation.title: Renovation & Remodeling
renovation.description: Transform existing spaces with modern designs and quality craftsmanship.

process.title: Our Construction Process
process.description: We follow a systematic approach to ensure your project is completed on time, within budget, and to your satisfaction.

planning.title: Planning & Design
planning.description: Collaborative planning and detailed design to capture your vision and requirements.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: Expert execution with quality materials and skilled craftsmanship.

completion.title: Completion & Handover
completion.description: Final inspections, quality checks, and smooth handover of your completed project.

properties.title: Real Estate
properties.subtitle: Featured Properties
properties.description: Discover our selection of premium properties in prime locations, designed for modern living and investment.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.description1: With over 20 years of experience in construction and real estate, Edirne Construction Limited has established a reputation for excellence and reliability. Our journey began with a simple mission: to create spaces that inspire and endure.
about.description2: Today, we're proud to be a leading provider of construction services and real estate solutions, known for our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from our satisfied clients about their experience working with Edirne Construction Limited.

client1.name: Sarah Johnson
client1.testimonial: Edirne Construction Limited transformed our vision into reality. Their attention to detail and quality craftsmanship exceeded our expectations. We love our new home!

client2.name: Michael Chen
client2.testimonial: The commercial space Edirne Construction Limited created for our business is perfect. They understood our needs and delivered a functional, beautiful space on time and within budget.

client3.name: Emily Rodriguez
client3.testimonial: I've worked with Edirne Construction Limited on multiple investment properties. Their expertise in both construction and real estate has been invaluable to my portfolio growth.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or ready to start your project? Contact us today for a consultation.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

underConstruction.title: Our Website is Under Construction
underConstruction.message: We're working hard to bring you a new and improved website. In the meantime, feel free to contact us for any inquiries about our construction and real estate services.
